food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I grow on trees.
💛 I am a good source of potassium.
🛥️ My shape is long and curved.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am often poured on cereal.
🐄 Cows make me.
🦴 I help make your bones strong.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👀 Eating me helps you see better.
🐰 Bugs Bunny likes me!

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I can be green or yellow too!
🥧 I am often used in pies.
🐛 A worm might live inside me.

food.question: I am a popular pizza topping. I am made from pork and am round and flat. What am I?

hints.text: 🐷 I come from a pig.
🍕 I make pizza taste yummy.
⚪ I am often spicy.

food.question: I am a long, green vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am very healthy!
👶 Some kids don't like eating me.
🌳 I look like a miniature tree.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast, and baked in an oven. You can make sandwiches with me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can make toast out of me.
🥪 Many breakfasts contain me.
🌾 I am often made from wheat.

food.question: I am a cold treat made from frozen milk, cream, sugar, and flavors. I am often eaten in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I melt in the sun.
🍨 I come in many flavors.
👅 You eat me with a spoon or lick me!

food.question: I am a grain that grows in a husk. People eat me all over the world, and you can pop me to make a tasty snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I can be yellow or white.
🍿 I'm delicious at the movies!
🌍 Many cultures eat me in different ways.

food.question: I'm a drink made from roasted beans. I can help you wake up in the morning, and many adults enjoy drinking me hot. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ I am often served in a mug.
😴 I help grown-ups stay awake at work.
🌱 I come from a bean.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and fluffy. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am cold.
🌨️ You can make snowballs with me.
🌬️ I often fall in winter.

weather.question: I'm hot and yellow, and I give you light. I go away at night. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am in the sky.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🔥 I am a star.

weather.question: I come down from the sky and make things wet. You need an umbrella when I arrive. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 Puddles form when I am here.
☔ Farmers need me to help crops grow.
🌧️ I am water falling from the clouds.

weather.question: I'm a big, white, fluffy thing that floats in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ Airplanes fly through me.
🐑 I look like a fluffy animal.
🌬️ I am made of water droplets or ice crystals.

weather.question: I am a strong wind that spins in a circle. I can cause a lot of damage. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye.
🏠 I can knock down trees and houses.
🌊 I form over warm ocean water.

weather.question: I'm a colorful arc in the sky, made when sunlight shines through raindrops. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
🌦️ You can only see me when it's raining and sunny at the same time.
🍀 Some people believe there's a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I am very cold, frozen rain. I can hurt if I hit you. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of ice.
🤕 I fall from clouds during thunderstorms.
⚽ I can be very small or very big, like a ball.

weather.question: I am a sudden, violent burst of wind, often with rain or snow. I only last a short time.

hints.text: 💨 I can make trees sway back and forth.
🍃 Leaves and debris can be scattered by me.
⚡ I am stronger than a regular breeze.

weather.question: I am a long period with little or no rain. Plants and animals suffer because of me.

hints.text: 🌵 The ground becomes very dry and cracked.
🔥 There is often a higher risk of wildfires when I'm around.
🏜️ I often affect farmers and their crops.

weather.question: I am a type of precipitation that is a mix of snow and rain. I'm often icy and slushy.

hints.text: ❄️🌧️ I'm not quite snow and not quite rain, but a bit of both!
🚗 Driving can be dangerous when I'm falling.
🧤You might need mittens to play in me.
